channel.title: Posts on Sustainability Matters
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sustainability Matters

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: How to test dark mode?
item.description: You can set dark mode as default by setting params.mode to dark in config.toml or set it to auto which will detect based on your OS and switch to dark mode. For more details refer documentation Here is how you can switch based on your OS iOS Android macOS Windows 10
